list.heading: Appetizers
item: Seafood salad: shrimp, calamari, scungilli, octopus, and mussels with lemon and extra-virgin olive oil
Tuscan garden salad: romaine lettuce, radicchio, tomatoes, and radishes with balsamic vinaigrette
Antipasti display: buffalo mozzarella, grilled eggplant, marinated mushrooms, artichokes, vine-ripened tomatoes
